title: Xiaomi 15 bootloader unlock via AQLR
description: Clean Python implementation of AQLR method for Xiaomi bootloader unlock. 4 parallel requests at midnight Beijing time with staggered offsets.
notes: COMPLETED: Audited original AQLR files (5 Python files, all clean, no malware). Rewrote as clean asyncio script using httpx+ntplib. Set up uv project. NEXT: Get browser tokens from c.mi.com/global, put in token.txt, run at midnight Beijing time.
